subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Stadiums and Arenas
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Poor shooting is common during N.C.A.A. tournament games at NRG Stadium in Houston, where black curtains behind the baskets seem to disrupt shooters’ depth perceptions.
snippet: Poor shooting is common during N.C.A.A. tournament games at NRG Stadium in Houston, where black curtains behind the baskets seem to disrupt shooters’ depth perceptions.
